bibl.title: The Indiana University Papyri
bibl.note: 1. Contract. Oxyrhynchus, 73 B.C. (?). - 2. Contract of sale. Theadelphia, A.D. 138. - 3. Contract for service. Late III. - 4. Daily expense account. III? - 5. Payments of grain. Early III. - 6. Penthemeros certificate. Tebtunis, A.D. 51. - 7. Tax receipt. Philadelphia, A.D. 302. - 8. Tax record. Early II. - 9. Tax register. Mid II. - 10. Letter. Late II-early III.
bibl.seg: Schuman Verne B., The Indiana University Papyri.
